alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Clay; Hall; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 8:20PM CDT until June 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clay County in south central Nebraska... Adams County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 820 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wood River, or 17 miles west of Grand Island, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wood River around 830 PM CDT. Alda and Prosser around 835 PM CDT. Doniphan around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hansen, Hastings, Trumbull, Harvard, Glenvil and Inland. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 290 and 324. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. This is a dangerous storm, capable of producing large hail driven by severe winds! SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! If you are caught outdoors, cover your head and neck.
